Enjoy some Rhythm Of The Night by Corona

PassBeat is a research tool to gather data on the retentiveness of rhythm-based passwords in comparison to text-based passwords. In other words, it helps researchers to find out whether rhythm-based passwords are easier to remember than conventional passwords.

By using PassBeat you participate in a field study and help researchers collecting data which will be used to gain new knowledge on password retentiveness. Without your help, this study would not be possible, so, thank you!
PassBeat will only transmit your login success ratio and the time of your login as well as the strength of your password. Your password is stored locally on the device and will not be transmitted.
For more information check out the PassBeat website.
